title: My Husband is Falling Out of Love
description:
Gina says she'd like harmony in her home, but her husband has a temper and she's a nag. - Dr. Laura: " Marriages improve when you find ways to compliment instead of complain."

What compliment could you give your spouse today? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura
